Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Family is Important "krhfarm"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in March 2006.  In September 2006 it stopped working and in December 2006 it was repaired under warranty.  I am not an avid picture taker but I wanted a decent digital camera to use on vacations.  In June 2007 I left for a 7 week trip of Canada's maritime provinces but 2 weeks into the trip the camera failed again.  since it has been over 1 year since the original camera was purchased Kodak will not stand behind the product.  I will never buy another Kodak product again!

Reviews.Title: V705 Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Reed "Gib"
Reviews.Content: This is an unbelievable camera. Multiple applications, 23 degree wide angle, small & compact,durable, exciting to use.Currently, I have two of these for our family use.

Reviews.Author: Kellie D. Beauregard
Reviews.Content: Most of the time this camera takes wonderful pictures...sometimes they are really blurry...I don't see  a difference having a dual lens vs a standard...I love the simplicity of the camera because all I know is "point and shoot" (which might be the reason for some of the blurry problems) my daughter loves it...my husband hates it...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Baker
Reviews.Content: I love this camera I got mine for vacation photos.  It is very easy to use and takes great pictures.  Highly reccommended!

Reviews.Title: Best P&S; Ever!
Reviews.Author: sday
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for at least 3 years now and its been the best camera ive ever had or used. The wide angle ability is amazing and you dont truely appreciate it until you look thru someone elses camera and see how limited the frame is. I dont know why they dont make more p&s; cameras like this. Im about to move up and purchase my first DSLR, and im actually very sad to be letting go of this camera. Its not the best for zoom or high resolutions but its made it thru tons of vacations and always took adequate pictures. Although when i bought it the price was significantly less, i definitely got more than my moneys worth.

Reviews.Title: pennyo
Reviews.Author: Penny Ostlund
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Easy to use and carry. I use it for all  my real estate needs.

Reviews.Title: A few years old and a bit dated
Reviews.Author: Zinnia
Reviews.Content: This camera was impressive when I bought it years ago. Now, however, technology has advanced. You can buy a snap and shoot digital camera with a better flash and better speed now.
